resources.string:
Science Game will help remind you of important concepts you have learned and will learn in LifeCycle of start.

These questions will help sharpen your skills and revise 

Just learn and have fun while playing!

Select the answer from the options given. Each time you get an answer correct, you advance to the next question and you will get +1 point.

If you get the answer wrong, -1 point will be deducted!. At last the result will be shown to you

 Happy Playing game.
I have scored %1$d/%2$d correct questions in Science Game App! You have to try this amazing app
